descript.abstract: The Horizon Structure Group table lists the ranges of soil structure for the referenced horizon. The row with the typically occurring structure is marked as being representative. The entry in this table is based on grouping of entries in the Horizon Structure table.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143

attr.attrdef: A non-connotative string of characters used to uniquely identify a record in the Horizon Structure Group table.
A yes/no field that indicates if a soil structure is representative for the horizon.
The unique identifier of a record in the Horizon table. Use this column to join the Horizon Structure Group table to the Horizon table.
The narrative description of the soil structure within a soil horizon.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
